import React from 'react' import '../Login/Login.css' import { useState } from 'react' import { func } from 'prop-types' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Login() { const [name,setName]=useState('') const [password,setPassword]=useState('') async function submit(){ let {data}=await axios.post('/login',{name,password}) console.log(data); } return (

setPassword(e.target.value)} type="password" className="form-control" placeholder="Password" required />
